vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.payout (patch_7.sol#101-105) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (patch_7.sol#103)

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.loseWager (patch_7.sol#113-117) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_7.sol#114)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.play (patch_7.sol#76-95):
	External calls:
	- loseWager(betLimit / 2) (patch_7.sol#89)
	External calls sending eth:
	- payout(msg.sender) (patch_7.sol#87)
	- loseWager(betLimit / 2) (patch_7.sol#89)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- randomSeed (patch_7.sol#91)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_7.sol#76-95) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_7.sol#107-111):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_7.sol#108)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_7.sol#109)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_7.sol#113-117):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_7.sol#114)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_7.sol#115)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_7.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:

	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_7.sol#108
